name: Kalzrak & Clash
description:
Once upon a time in the distant land of Tzonac, Kalzrak and his human companion were taking a lovely walk. They discovered a strange metal box, with a stranger metal man inside. Who is this robot? Why was he there? And why does he seem so similar to Kalzrak...?

  • A web-based interactive fiction about two robots becoming fast friends
  • Also a playable teaser for the upcoming mystery visual novel, Clash: Robot Detective
  • Play as Kalzrak, the titular character from the romance visual novel, Kalzrak
  • Featuring photography from Unsplash.com

*If the first image is not loading for you, that's okay because its not loading for me either.
